name: Souls Panic
description:
GAME

Luna must take souls arriving on the river, to place them in their wells.  

There are 4 areas :

  • Neutral (no well);
  • Paradise (clouds, blue souls) ;
  • Hell (lava, red souls) ;
  • Earth (grass, purple souls).

Warning to the number of souls present in each zone! The more there are, the more the thermometers fill up.  

When an area is overloaded, the thermometer breaks and the well is disabled.  
You lose the game when 3 thermometers are broken (the waiting space can't contain an inifinity of souls !).

>>> CLIC HERE TO PLAY ONLINE (WebGL) <<<

CONTROLS

WASD/DirectionalArrows : Move Luna, the cutest reaper (main character)  
Space bar : Catch/Release souls (hold on release to throw souls)  
E : Near switches, reverse water flow

CONTENT

We made all the graphics in pixel art, as well as composed the music especially for the occasion.

TEAM
For our first GameJam, we realized this game in 4 members team. We hope you enjoy it !

Have fun and don't panic ! ;-)
